text: 17:5 Rom 4:17Eghtɨ nɨn ziam datɨrɨghɨn uam Abram puvatɨgham. Guizbangɨra, kɨ nɨ damightɨ, nɨ kantrin avɨribar gumazamizibar ovavimɨn otogham. Ezɨ kamaghɨn, datɨrɨghɨn nɨn ziam, Abraham.17:5 Hibrun akamɨn ziar kam, “Abraham,” an mɨngarim mong kamaghɨn ghu, “Kantrin avɨribar gumazamizibar afeziam.”
